Description: Copy a file or directory from one location to another. Supports recursive copying for directories.
Options:
"-'r': Copy directories recursively
-p: Preserve file attributes
-i: Prompt before overwrite"
Installation on Ubuntu: Pre-installed
Installation on CentOS: Pre-installed
Installation on Other Distros: Pre-installed

Description: Move a file or directory to a new location or rename it within the same directory.
Options:
"-i: Prompt before overwrite
-u: Move only if the source is newer than the destination"
Installation on Ubuntu: Pre-installed
Installation on CentOS: Pre-installed
Installation on Other Distros: Pre-installed

Description: Delete a specified file or directory. Use with caution as this action is irreversible.
Options:
"-'r': Remove directories and their contents recursively
-f: Ignore nonexistent files and never Prompt"
Installation on Ubuntu: Pre-installed
Installation on CentOS: Pre-installed
Installation on Other Distros: Pre-installed

Description: Send ICMP echo requests to a server to verify its availability and measure response time.
Options:
"-'c': Specify the number of packets to send
-i: Set interval between packets"
Installation on Ubuntu: Pre-installed
Installation on CentOS: Pre-installed
Installation on Other Distros: Pre-installed

Description: Retrieve files from the internet using HTTP, HTTPS, or FTP protocols. Supports resuming downloads.
Options:
"--continue: Resume a partially downloaded file
-q: Quiet mode, no output"
Installation on Ubuntu: sudo apt install wget
Installation on CentOS: sudo yum install wget
Installation on Other Distros: sudo pacman -S wget

Description: Trace the route to a network host
Installation on Ubuntu: sudo apt install traceroute
Installation on CentOS: sudo yum install traceroute
Installation on Other Distros: sudo zypper install traceroute

Description: Show disk usage information
Installation on Ubuntu:
1. Download from Broadcom: https://docs.broadcom.com/
2. Extract the file: tar -xzvf MegaCli.tar.gz
3. Copy the executable: sudo cp MegaCli64 /usr/local/bin/
4. Set permissions: sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/MegaCli64
5. Verify installation: MegaCli64 -v
Installation on CentOS:
1. Download from Broadcom: https://docs.broadcom.com/
2. Extract the file: tar -xzvf MegaCli.tar.gz
3. Copy the executable: sudo cp MegaCli64 /usr/local/bin/
4. Set permissions: sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/MegaCli64
5. Verify installation: MegaCli64 -v
Installation on Other Distros:
1. Download from Broadcom: https://docs.broadcom.com/
2. Extract the file: tar -xzvf MegaCli.tar.gz
3. Copy the executable: sudo cp MegaCli64 /usr/local/bin/
4. Set permissions: sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/MegaCli64
5. Verify installation: MegaCli64 -v
